official_title: To amend chapter 8 of title 17, United States Code, to reduce the number of Commissioners on the Copyright Royalty Tribunal, to increase the salary of such Commissioners, and for other purposes.
short_title: Copyright Royalty Tribunal Reform Act of 1989

summary.text: Copyright Royalty Tribunal Reform Act of 1989 - Amends Federal copyright law to decrease Copyright Royalty Tribunal membership to three commissioners. Increases the compensation for such commissioners.

titles.title: Copyright Royalty Tribunal Reform Act of 1989
To amend chapter 8 of title 17, United States Code, to reduce the number of Commissioners on the Copyright Royalty Tribunal, to increase the salary of such Commissioners, and for other purposes.
